def forward(self, x1, x2):
        x = torch.cat([x1, x2], dim=1)
        x = self.act(self.in_0(x))

        x = self.conv0(x)
        if self.residual == True:
            skip = x
        x = self.act(self.in_1(x))

        x = self.act(self.in_2(self.conv1(x)))
        x = self.conv2(x)
        if self.residual == True:
            x = x + skip

        x = self.act(self.in_3(x))
        x = self.conv3(x)
